results.title: Metformin induces myeloma cells necrosis and apoptosis and it is considered for therapeutic use.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ induces @DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@myeloma@@@ cells @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ and apoptosis and it is considered for therapeutic use.

results.title: Effect of metformin alone and in combination with etoposide and epirubicin on proliferation, apoptosis, necrosis, and migration of B-CPAP and SW cells as thyroid cancer cell lines
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone and in combination with @CHEMICAL_Etoposide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005047 @@@etoposide@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Epirubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015251 @@@epirubicin@@@ on proliferation, apoptosis, @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@, and migration of @CELLLINE_CVCL:0153 @@@B-CPAP@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:R777 @@@SW@@@ cells as @DISEASE_Thyroid_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013964 @@@thyroid cancer@@@ cell lines

results.title: Metformin coordinates osteoblast/osteoclast differentiation associated with ischemic osteonecrosis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (25 mg/kg) protected against @DISEASE_Femur_Head_Necrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005271 @@@ischemic necrosis@@@ in the epiphysis of the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ femoral head by maintaining osteoblast/osteocyte function and vascular density but inhibiting osteoclast activity in the @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrotic@@@ femoral head.

citations.NLM: Park SH, Kang MA, Moon YJ, Jang KY, Kim JR. Metformin coordinates osteoblast/osteoclast differentiation associated with ischemic osteonecrosis Aging (Albany NY). 2020 Feb 11;12(6):4727-4741. PMID: 32045366

results.title: TNF induces pathogenic mitochondrial ROS in tuberculosis through reverse electron transport
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ also inhibited TNF-mediated @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ of Mm-infected macrophages (Fig. 7G).

results.title: Effectiveness of Metformin for the Reversal of Cold-Ischemia-Induced Damage in Hepatosteatosis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Hepatosteatosis decreased significantly with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. The @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@steatotic liver@@@ group had more prominent pericentral @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ as well as showing a decreased and more delayed AMPK response than the non-fat group.

citations.NLM: Oruc M, Gedik ME, Uner M, Ulug E, Unal RN, Gunaydin G, Dogrul AB. Effectiveness of Metformin for the Reversal of Cold-Ischemia-Induced Damage in Hepatosteatosis. Clin Res Hepatol Gastroenterol. 2024 Mar 9;():102314. PMID: 38467276

results.title: Metformin aggravates pancreatitis by regulating the release of oxidised mitochondrial DNA via the frataxin (FXN)/ninjurin 1 (NINJ1) signalling pathway.
results.text_hl: @GENE_NINJ1 @GENE_4814 @@@NINJ1@@@ knockout eliminated the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced acinar cell @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ and elevation of Ox-mtDNA levels, and mtDNA depletion reversed the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on acinar cell death.

citations.NLM: Xin G, Zhou Q, Wang T, Wan C, Yu X, Li K, Li F, Li S, Dong Y, Wang Y, Feng L, Zhang K, Wen A, Huang W. Metformin aggravates pancreatitis by regulating the release of oxidised mitochondrial DNA via the frataxin (FXN)/ninjurin 1 (NINJ1) signalling pathway. Br J Pharmacol. 2025 May 9;():. PMID: 40344214

results.title: Cell death in Ustilago maydis: comparison with other fungi and the effect of metformin and curcumin on its chronological lifespan.
results.text_hl: These data indicate that @SPECIES_5270 @@@U. maydis@@@ may be a eukaryotic model organism to elucidate the molecular mechanism underlying apoptotic and @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@ pathways, and the lifespan increase caused by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Curcumin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003474 @@@curcumin@@@.

citations.NLM: Soberanes-Gutiérrez CV, León-Ramírez C, Sánchez-Segura L, Cordero-Martínez E, Vega-Arreguín JC, Ruiz-Herrera J. Cell death in Ustilago maydis: comparison with other fungi and the effect of metformin and curcumin on its chronological lifespan. FEMS Yeast Res. 2020 Oct 15;20(7):. PMID: 32945857

results.title: Metformin beyond an anti-diabetic agent: A comprehensive and mechanistic review on its effects against natural and chemical toxins.
results.text_hl: Besides lowering @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood sugar@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can attenuate the effects of toxins on body weight, @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, apoptosis, @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@, @GENE_CASP3 @GENE_836 @@@caspase-3@@@ activation, cell viability and survival rate, @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@reactive oxygen species@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@ROS@@@), @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_4790 @@@NF-kappaB@@@, @GENE_TNF @GENE_7124 @@@TNF-alpha@@@, many interleukins, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile, and many enzymes activity such as @GENE_CAT @GENE_847 @@@catalase@@@ and superoxide dismutase.

Metformin beyond an anti-diabetic agent: A comprehensive and mechanistic review on its effects against natural and chemical toxins. Biomed Pharmacother. 2023 Aug 1;165():115263. PMID: 37541178

results.title: Glucose 6-phosphate dehydrogenase inhibition sensitizes melanoma cells to metformin treatment
results.text_hl: The combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_6_aminonaphthalene_2_sulfonic_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C050850 @@@6-AN@@@ decreased @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ consumption and @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ production, altered the mitochondrial potential and redox balance, and thereby blocked @DISEASE_Melanoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@ cell progression, directing cells to apoptosis and @<m>DISEASE_Necrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009336 @@@necrosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Arbe MF, Agnetti L, Breininger E, Glikin GC, Finocchiaro LME, Villaverde MS. Glucose 6-phosphate dehydrogenase inhibition sensitizes melanoma cells to metformin treatment Transl Oncol. 2020 Nov;13(11):100842. PMID: 32781368
